resources.string: On home screen there will be 4 options to select. User can choose any of them. First option Introduction will lead to a window that will give user a choice of EQ and IQ both.After selecting any of the one from above options the detailed information about the selected choice will be displayed to user.The second option Attempt Quiz will lead to a window that will give user a choice of EQ and IQ both to start the respective quiz.If user selects an IQ quiz, he or she will be redirected to a new window where user will have to enter his or her birthdate. Start quiz button is provided at the bottom of the screen to start the quiz and now user can give the test for an IQ.If user selects EQ quiz, the quiz will start and now he/she can give the test for an EQ. Once quiz started, A qustion number, Question and 4(for IQ) or 5(for EQ) choices of answer will be displayed from which user will have to select one. And click Next button for the next question. He or she can go to the previous question by clicking Prev button. There is also Stop button to stop the quiz. After user attempts his last question a list of his or her answered and unanswered questions will be displayed. When user clicks Submit button the final result will be displayed. From here user can go to home screen by clicking Home screen button. User can exit from the application by clicking exit button on home screen.

IQ is an intelligent quotient.An Intelligence Quotient (IQ) is a score derived from one of several standardized tests designed to assess intelligence. There are many different kinds of IQ tests used to find out persons IQ. Some tests are visual, some are verbal, some tests only use abstract-reasoning problems, and some tests concentrate on arithmetic, spatial imagery, reading, vocabulary, memory or general knowledge. IQ can change to some degree over the course of childhood. A IQ test is not something for which a person can study. It test does not measure the quantity of your knowledge but rather measures a persons general intellectual ability to understand ideas, as compared to the general population at the same developmental level. How well we reason, distinguish relationships and solve problems are the kinds of things the test aims to discern. An IQ test also measures how well we process information, particularly our ability to store and retrieve it. For IQ the ranges are: 140 above Genius 100-140 Intelligent 71-99 Average 50-70 Below Average Below 50 Dumb

EQ is geneerally how the person understands emotions or situations and act appropriately. How an individual face a situation with understandning it and acting properly. An Emotional Quotient can be strengthen and improved by emplementing EQ assignments. There are three models which are developed for calculating the EQ. 1.ability model which focusses on individuals ability to process emotional information and use it to navigate the social environment. 2.trait model focuses on behavioral dispositions and self perceived abilities and is measured through self report. 3.The finan model is the mixed model is a combination of both ability and trait EI. It defines EI as an array of skills and characteristics that drive leadership performance A factor that affects our EI is Mental Health. Mental Health: Mental health (or behavioral health) is a level of psychological well-being, or an absence of a mental disorder. it is the "psychological state of someone who is functioning at a satisfactory level of emotional and behavioral adjustment. There are many assumptions about emotional intelligence and age. some parts of emotional intelligence (EQ) do increase with age, though the effect is slight; in addition there are elements of EQ that do not increase with age indicating some competencies must be developed through training.
Calculation: There are three Categories of the EQ 1.Above avarage 2.below avarage 3.avarage
